    index="example-index",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "text": {
                "type": "text"
            },
            "vector": {
                "type": "dense_vector",
                "dims": 1,
                "index": True,
                "similarity": "l2_norm",
                "index_options": {
                    "type": "hnsw"
                }
            },
            "integer": {
                "type": "integer"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
